sentences.sContent: Fills me with the urge to defecate!
sentences.sContent_eng: Fills me with the urge to defecate!
sentences.sCn: 让我充满了要澄清一切的欲望！

sentences.sContent: Arrive gravid and terminal, increscent uterus and fetal show an oppressive rectum first, also can cause defecate difficulty.
sentences.sContent_eng: Arrive gravid and terminal, increscent uterus and fetal show an oppressive rectum first, also can cause defecate difficulty.
sentences.sCn: 到妊娠晚期，增大的子宫和胎儿先露部压迫直肠，也都能导致排便困难。

remMethod.val: de(向下) + fec(做) + ate(动词后缀) → 向下做 → 排便

trans.tranOther: to get rid of waste matter from your  bowel s
